note.p: Education: Latymer Upper School, King Street, London (left 1907); MA, ScD

Career: His Majesty's Astronomer at the Cape; ex-Fellow of Jesus College, Cambridge; Chief Assistant, Royal Observatory, Greenwich, 1913-1923; Assistant Director of Optical Supplies, Woolwich, 1916-1919; Secretary, Royal Astronomical Society, 1923
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1961 vol 7 pp 137-145, plate, by R v d R Woolley
